channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Canada Loses Its Status as Having Eliminated Measles
item.description: The disease was once considered eliminated in Canada, but not any more — there have been more than 5,000 cases in the last 12 months as vaccination ra...

item.title: Wendy’s plans hundreds of store closures to boost profits
item.description: The company said it expected a “mid-single-digit percentage” of its U.S. stores to be affected, but it didn't give any more details.

item.title: Supreme Court Denies Request to Revisit Same-Sex Marriage Decision
item.description: Kim Davis, a Kentucky county clerk who refused to issue same-sex marriage licenses, had asked the court to reconsider its landmark 2015 opinion.

item.title: AI stocks lead Wall Street rebound as Nvidia, Palantir surge and S&P 500 claws back last week’s losses
item.description: Nvidia was by far the strongest force lifting the market and rallied 4.8%. It's a bounceback after Nvidia and other winners in the frenzy around artif...

item.title: Supreme Court rejects call to overturn its decision legalizing same-sex marriage nationwide
item.description: The justices, without comment, turned away an appeal from Kim Davis, the former Kentucky court clerk who refused to issue marriage licenses to same-se...

item.title: Bonnie Watson Coleman of New Jersey to Retire From Congress
item.description: Ms. Watson Coleman, 80, the first Black woman to represent New Jersey in Congress, said she would not run for a seventh term in the state’s 12th Congr...

item.title: Prison Guards Shaved His Dreadlocks. The Supreme Court Seems Skeptical He Can Sue.
item.description: Lower courts condemned the treatment of Damon Landor, a Rastafarian, but found that a federal law protecting religious rights barred him from suing pr...

item.title: ‘Envy and greed walk hand in hand’: Warren Buffett casts side eye on Elon Musk-sized pay packages in final send-off
item.description: The Berkshire Hathaway CEO wrote in his final annual shareholder letter that executives are taking note of each other’s exorbitant compensation packag...

item.title: Why the BBC Is Facing Its Gravest Crisis in Decades
item.description: The British public service broadcaster apologized on Monday for a misleadingly edited documentary about President Trump. But the scandal had already c...

item.title: Trump’s $2,000 tariff ‘dividends’ would cost twice as much as the revenue coming in, budget watchdog warns
item.description: “If tariff dividends are paid annually, deficits would increase by $6 trillion over ten years,” per the Committee for a Responsible Federal Budget.

item.title: Syria’s President Meets Trump at White House for First Time
item.description: The visit by President Ahmed al-Shara is another step in the transformation of the former rebel leader once wanted by the United States as a terrorist...

item.title: Ukraine’s Anti-Corruption Agencies Push Back Despite Zelensky Pressure
item.description: Months after Ukraine’s president tried to cripple them, the agencies said they had uncovered a major scheme involving the state-owned nuclear energy c...

item.title: Explosion Reported Near Red Fort in New Delhi
item.description: India’s top security official said the cause of the blast, near the Red Fort in the capital, was still being investigated.
